text:
Michel Dumont (29 January 1941 – 13 August 2020) was a Canadian actor. He was the artistic director for the Théâtre Jean-Duceppe in Montreal from 1991 to 2018. He was known for his movie roles in "Chocolate Eclair" (1979), "Without Her" (2005) and "Café de Flore" (2011).
Dumont died on 13 August 2020 of lung cancer in Montreal at the age of 79.
